name: transaction_id
description: Unique identifier for the sales transaction.

name: transaction_line_number
description: Line number of the detailed sale transaction.

name: transaction_date
description: Date when the transaction occurred.

name: transaction_time
description: Time when the transaction occurred.

name: transaction_line_type_code
description: Unique identifier for the type of line transaction.

name: product_code
description: Product code for the line.

name: product_label
description: Product label for the line.

name: product_ean
description: Product ean for the line.

name: amount_including_tax
description: amount for the line with taxes included

name: amount_excluding_tax
description: amount for the line with taxes excluded

name: tax_amount
description: tax amount for the line

name: discount_amount
description: discount amount for the line

name: product_quantity
description: Quantity for the product

name: business_unit_code
description: Unique identifier for the business unit where the transaction occurred.

name: store_code
description: Unique identifier for the store where the transaction occurred.

name: register_code
description: Unique identifier for the register where the transaction occurred.

name: created_at
description: technical field to capture the timestamp when the record was created.

name: updated_at
description: technical field to capture the timestamp when the record was last updated.

name: created_by
description: User or system who created the transaction.

name: updated_by
description: User or system who last updated the transaction.
